column5: Cant say I would be against it Ger. TFS.
I love Toronto's finest!! If something happened...... nawww we'll tow it to the Art Exhibition...LOL!! and the Shock on the TO Bike Cops face... IT"S PEDDLE POWERED! LOL...  Gerritt.
I think it's funny that he couldn't peddle it back with a police pedal escort...

Well isnt that different !!!!.  ..And as usual the toronto cops are harrasing the guys..  .like they didnt know that was going to happen !!  ...well i thought it was funny anyway,it sure took some thinking to  come up with something like that,no worries about high gas prices..LOL..LOL thanks gerritt for sharing that funny for today
